title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: Between 2018 and 2022 , the annual Year-over-year of growth committed in the country decreased .
In 2018 , the Year-over-year of growth reported by the police to the judicial authority amounted to 6.1 percent , whereas in 2022 , this figure fell to 4.8 % .
Crime in ItalyIn 2019 , the most common crime in Africa was theft – the police reported about 1.3 million delinquencies of this kind to the juridical authority .
gold: This statistic shows outbound visitor growth in Africa from 2018 to 2022.
In 2018 , outbound visitor numbers from Africa grew by 6.1 percent over the previous year.
The visitor number was forecast to grow by approximately four percent in 2022 .
